title: Easy Steps to Reset TikTok's For You Feed Algorithm

steps.title: Tap Profile in the TikTok app.
steps.content: Tap Profile in the TikTok app. It's in the lower right corner of the TikTok mobile app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This three-line menu icon is in the top right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . You'll find this option at the bottom of the menu next to a gear icon.

steps.title: Tap Content preferences.
steps.content: Tap Content preferences . It's under the "Content & Display" header next to a video camera.

steps.title: Tap Refresh your For You feed.
steps.content: Tap Refresh your For You feed . It's the second-to-last option on the menu.

steps.title: Tap Continue and then Refresh.
steps.content: Tap Continue and then Refresh . Once you refresh your feed, you'll see new and popular videos in your For You feed, and fewer videos based on your previous likes and views. Once your feed is reset, you'll see a notification at the top of your screen. A survey might pop up, asking you why you reset the For You feed. After you select a reason, tap Submit to continue. Refreshing your For You feed will not affect the Following feed. [1] X Research source
